10 Judge demands release of 615 illegal immigrants arrested during Illinois ICE crackdown (thepostmillennial.com) posted 2 hours ago by Eruditio 5 comments award share report block BREAKING: Judge demands release of 615 illegal immigrants arrested during Illinois ICE crackdown US District Judge Jeffrey Cummings ruled Wednesday that the detentions violated a 2022 settlement agreement restricting warrantless arrests in the Chicago area. thepostmillennial.com
